name: Zjedz trawkę
description:
One of my first games ever, made somewhere between 2002 and 2003 (10-11 yo).

It's a simple game about a guinea pig which found itself very hungry after evil hamsters stole all the grass hay from her.

I'm almost sure there was some version with music and some basic sounds back when I created it. Unfortunately, seems like this is the only version that survived various data losses and general mess. [edit] Actually, there is music! You just need to have MIDI playback configured properly :)

Made in The Games Factory, re-exported with The Games Factory 2 (I've only found the project file). Works under Wine. It's in Polish, but not knowing it shouldn't be any problem.
